text: Wilkesboro-Smithey Hotel, also known as the Smithey Hotel or Smithey's Department Store, is a historic hotel building located at Wilkesboro, Wilkes County, North Carolina. It was built in 1891, and is a three-story, nine bay by six bay, brick building. It features a two-story wraparound gallery porch. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982. ==References== Category:Hotel buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1891 Category:Buildings and structures in Wilkes County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Wilkes County, North Carolina
title: Wilkesboro-Smithey Hotel
